name: A Mix of American Sports Quiz | USA | 10 Questions

questions.text: In which year did the Florida Marlins win their first World Series?
questions.explanation:
1997.

	The Marlins began their franchise in 1993.  They won their first World Series in 1997 against the Indians, and they won their second World Series in 2003 against the Yankees.

questions.text: Which NFL team did Hall of Fame quarterback Dan Fouts play for?
questions.explanation:
San Diego Chargers.

	Dan Fouts was a quarterback who played for the San Diego Chargers from 1973-1987. He was drafted by the Chargers also.

questions.text: Which NCAA football team did Dan Marino play for?
questions.explanation:
Pittsburgh Panthers.

	Marino played for the Pittsburgh Panthers and was then drafted by the Miami Dolphins. He never won a Super Bowl, but is in the Hall of Fame.  He is considered as one of the best quarterbacks along with Terry Bradshaw, Joe Montana, and John Elway.

questions.text: What is NBA player Chris Paul's nickname?
questions.explanation:
CP3.

	Chris Paul was drafted in 2005 by the New Orleans Hornets. He went to the college of Wake Forest and played the position of point guard. He is nicknamed CP3 for Chris Paul (CP) and number 3 for the number that he wears.

questions.text: Which team NBA team drafted Derrick Rose?
questions.explanation:
Chicago Bulls.

	Rose went to the college of Memphis, and he is a point guard as well as Chris Paul.  Derrick Rose goes by the nickname of "Pooh" because his grandmother would call him "Pooh" as a little baby, because he was chubby and yellow like Pooh Bear.

questions.text: Which Major League Baseball team was Hanley Ramirez drafted by?
questions.explanation:
Boston Red Sox.

	Hanley Ramirez was drafted by the Boston Red Sox in 2005, and was then traded to the Florida Marlins. He plays shortstop. He lived in the Dominican Republic and was born on December 23, 1983. He was named 2006 National League Rookie of the Year, and finished runner-up to David Ortiz in the 2010 Home Run Derby.

questions.text: Which was James Harrison's third NFL team?
questions.explanation:
Pittsburgh Steelers.

	James Harrison played for two NFL teams and one European NFL team. He played for the Pittsburgh Steelers, Baltimore Ravens, and the Rhein Fire. He plays linebacker.

questions.text: Which college did NBA player Dwyane Wade play for?
questions.explanation:
Marquette  Golden Eagles.

	Dwyane Wade played for the Marquette Golden Eagles, and was then drafted by the Miami Heat in 2003.

questions.text: Which NFL team went undefeated including winning all preseason games, regular season games, postseason games, and the Super Bowl?
questions.explanation:
Miami Dolphins.

	The Miami Dolphins went undefeated in the 1972 season, including winning the Super Bowl.  They had two running backs rush for 1000 yards in the season, the first time that a team had two.

questions.text: Which of these was Wayne Gretzky's last NHL team?
questions.explanation:
New York Rangers.

	Wayne Gretzky was a great hockey player who played in the NHL. He retired in 1999, finishing his career with the New York Rangers. He only played for four teams. He was on the Olympic hockey team, and won four Stanley Cups all with the Edmonton Oilers.
